text:
London Start Up Fintech Consultancy Looking to Hire a Developer - Permanent Onsite Role in Mayfair.

Skills Required: 6+ years of full-stack development, C#, .NET, Agular.JS, MongoDB, REST

Join a team of 5 agile developers working on a disruptive greenfield project utilising the latest technologies. Opportunity for growth & advancement.

If interested, please email: Katherine.kaplan@holleyholland.com
